contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Union|<!-- Please include all unused fields for future use. See [[template talk:Infobox Union]] for usage. --> |name= YFL |country= [[Canada]] |affiliation= [[Canadian Labour Congress|CLC]] |members= 3,300 |full_name= Yukon Federation of Labour |native_name= |image= [[Image:YFL logo.jpg]] |founded= 1980 |current= |head= |dissolved_date= |dissolved_state= |merged_into= |office= [[Whitehorse, Yukon]] |people= [[Alex Furlong]], president |website= [http://www.yukonfed.com/ www.yukonfed.com] |footnotes= }} The '''Yukon Federation of Labour''' (YFL) is the [[Yukon]] [[trade union]] federation of the [[Canadian Labour Congress]] (CLC). Although the Yukon is not, strictly speaking, a province, the CLC has recognized the YFL as a [[:Category:Provincial federations of labour (Canada)|provincial federation of labour]] with the same standing as those of the ten Canadian provinces. The YFL was founded in 1980 and has a membership of 3,300. ==External links== *[http://www.yukonfed.com/ www.yukonfed.com] {{Portal|Organized labour}} {{Canadian Labour Congress}} [[Category:Canadian Labour Congress]] [[Category:Provincial federations of labour (Canada)]] {{NorthAm-trade-union-stub}}
